| HistoryText             = The Mantis Marines are Preying Mantis soldiers that exist in the section of [[Nowhere]] known as the Victory Garden and are the product of the imagination of [[Jimmy Jankovicz (Earth-616)|Jimmy Jupiter]]. They are soldiers who help defend the Victory Garden from invasion  by [[Japanese Beetles (Nowhere) (Earth-616)|Japanese Beetles]]. They are inspired by the United States Army.{{r|Marvel Mystery Comics Vol 1 47}}
